message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes packed with features that promise to enhance your daily experience. Considering its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than $80. Would you be interested in purchasing it for this special introductory price? Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $95 is a good price, but I'm really hoping to get it for a little less.  I'm happy to pay $80 for it right now.  What do you think?
